name: pnp-list-formatting-teams-group-format
title: teams group format
shortDescription: This sample uses Microsoft Teams deep links to create Teams chat group based on selected users with associated Group name and message.
longDescription: This sample uses Microsoft Teams deep links to create Teams chat group based on selected users with associated Group name and message.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
